category.name: Product Structure.Product Structure Synchronization
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOM_Enable_Quantity_Validation_Against_Ref_Designator
preference.preference_description: Verifies whether the quantity is blank or 1 when the reference designator is assigned. Valid Values: true - Verifies that when a reference designator value is assigned, the quantity is either blank or 1. Verifies that when a quantity that is neither blank nor 1 is to be set, the reference designator value of the line is not assigned. An error appears when the values do not comply.For example, when the reference designator is C1 and a user changes the quantity to 3, an error appears. Or, if the quantity is 3 and a user sets the reference designator to C1, an error appears. false - The system does not validate reference designator values.
